Specific outcomes • Identify the main processes of bone development • Provide detailed explanations of intramembranous ossification • Provide detailed explanations of endochondral ossification* • Discuss the cell types involved including their specific location and function • Describe growth & remodelling of bone Objectives 1. Describe the processes of bone formation- two types: • Intramembranous ossification • Develops directly from mesenchymal cells • E.g. Flat bones of the skull & face • Endochondral ossification • Requires a hyaline cartilage model • E.g. Bones of extremities & weight-bearing 2. Describe the structure and function of cell types involved Ross MH & Pawlina W..eds. Histology: A Text & Atlas, 5e. Baltimore, MD: Lippincott Williams & Wilkins; 2006.
